description:
After a giant claw kidnaps their eggs, the Angry Birds chase it into a wormhole and find themselves floating in a faraway galaxy surrounded by strange planets, Space Pigs and best of all… zero gravity! But watch out Space Pigs – the birds have some awesome new superpowers of their own! 

PLAY THE FULL VERSION – FOR FREE!
Now you can play every level from the full version of the game! Simply watch a short video from one of our partners to unlock a level!

250+ INTERSTELLAR LEVELS!
From the fiery volcanoes of the Red Planet to the deep waters of the Pig Dipper world, play over 250 spectacular levels that are out of this world!

NOTE: This free app contains video advertising and optional in-app purchases.

---

LATEST UPDATE: BEAK IMPACT!
Strap in and get ready for launch – it’s the biggest Angry Birds Space update ever! To celebrate over two years of epic intergalactic adventure, it’s the all-new BEAK IMPACT episode!

40 NEW LEVELS
Spread across two parts!

FIND NASA SPACECRAFT
...to unlock four bonus levels!

SIX MORE BONUS LEVELS
Unlock with three stars and a feather on each level!

SEND IN THE MIGHTY BUZZARD
Buzz Aldrin, legendary astronaut and moonwalker, is at hand to save the day!

ASTEROID SHOWER
Navigate burning, freezing and radioactive space rocks!

GAS TANKS AND BATTERIES
Try giving them a nudge!

---


Important Message for Parents

This game may include:
- Direct links to social networking websites that are intended for an audience over the age of 13.
- Direct links to the internet that can take players away from the game with the potential to browse any web page.
- Advertising of Rovio products and also products from select partners.
- The option to make in-app purchases. The bill payer should always be consulted beforehand.

---

Terms of Use: http://www.rovio.com/eula 
Privacy Policy: http://www.rovio.com/privacy
releaseNotes: We addressed some minor issues in order to improve the user experience. Thanks for playing, and keep popping those pigs!
